blogPost.excerpt: The most powerful product analytics tool on the market, with up to 10x the data limits of other free plans. Plus, early-stage startups get a year of Mixpanel's Growth plan for free. ✔️ 100K monthly tracked users ✔️ All core reports ✔️ Unlimited data history
blogPost.body: The most powerful product analytics tool on the market, with up to 10x the data limits of other free plans. Plus, early-stage startups get a year of Mixpanel's Growth plan for free. ✔️ 100K monthly tracked users ✔️ All core reports ✔️ Unlimited data history
blogPost.title: Mixpanel's New Free Plan + Startup Perks - The most powerful product analytics, for free
blogPost.author: Laura Krieger

localize.description: 市场上最强大的产品分析工具，数据限制是其他免费计划的10倍。另外，早期创业公司可免费获得一年的Mixpanel成长计划。✔️每月跟踪10万用户 ✔️所有核心报表 ✔️无限数据历史记录。
localize.tagline: 最强大的产品分析，免费的

localize.description: 市場上最強大的產品分析工具，數據限制是其他免費計劃的10倍。另外，早期創業公司可免費獲得一年的Mixpanel成長計劃。✔️每月跟蹤10萬用戶 ✔️所有核心報表 ✔️無限數據歷史記錄。
localize.tagline: 最強大的產品分析，免費的

previous.excerpt: Daily prompts and inspiration to get your creativity flowing, and a wonderful community of artists to support you as you grow. I made it to get my mum to start drawing again, and now we get over 1000 submissions a day! Available on iOS and Android
previous.title: Sketch a Day: artist community & prompts - Daily prompts, powered by our positive community of artists

localize.description: 每天的提示和灵感，让你的创造力流动，和一个精彩的艺术家社区，支持你的成长。我做它是为了让我妈妈重新开始画画，现在我们每天有超过1000个提交的作品! 可在iOS和Android上使用
localize.tagline: 由我们积极的艺术家社区提供的每日提示。
